24.14: Now therefore fear the Lord, and serve him perfectly and in truth...
24.15: If it seem evil to you to serve the Lord, you have your choice...
24.16: And the people answered, and said: God forbid we should leave the Lord...
24.29: And after these things Josue the son of Nun the servant of the Lord died...

16.1: The prayer of David. Hear, O Lord, my justice...
16.11: Thou hast made known to me the ways of life...

19.13: Then were little children presented to him...
19.14: But Jesus said to them: Suffer the little children...
19.15: And when he had imposed hands upon them, he departed from thence.
